name: adr
description: This repo contains ADR for Avanti Fellows, served as a static S3 website

scripts.deploy-staging: vuepress build docs && aws --profile plio-s3-bot --region ap-south-1 s3 sync ./docs/.vuepress/dist s3://plio-docs-staging --delete --acl public-read
scripts.deploy: vuepress build docs && aws --profile plio-s3-bot --region ap-south-1 s3 sync ./docs/.vuepress/dist s3://plio-docs --delete --acl public-read
